title: Cranberry Pecan Brie Cups
ingredients: 1/2 lb Brie cheese (rind removed), cut into 24 pieces
instructions: Preheat 350°. Press wonton wrappers into miniature muffin cups coated with cooking spray. Bake 6-8 mins or until edges are brown. Meanwhile, in small saucepan combine cranberry sauce, marmalade, honey, brandy, & spices; heat through over med. heat, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Divide cheese among wonton cups, top with cranberry mixture. Sprinkle with pecans. Bake 8-10 mins or until heated through & wrappers are golden brown.
